summary: A prostitute named Tong Tong enters the life of a man who runs a barbecue pork restaurant and quickly begins to ruin his life, as well as the life of his two rotund sons, and a local gangster.
cast: Xun Zhou|Glen Chin|You-Nam Wong|Sze Ping Leung|Wei-Men Hu|Kit Man Tam|Kam Li Wan|Chui-Ling Chan|King Lung Chan|Wai Keung Chan|Wai Hung Fong|Sai Man Ho|Jupiter|Jun La Koo|King Kwong Lai|Wing Cheung Lai|Ka Dung Li|Karuna Morris|Anthony Ng|Kam Yiu Ngai|Tsou-choi Tsang|Chi Fat Wong|Jupiter Wong|Kai Hing Wong|Tak Him Wong|Lok Man Yu|Hang Hing Yuen
title: Heung Gong you ge He Li Huo
